message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I can go up to $12,000 for the product.
